title: Targus Deluxe Top-Loading Leather Case for 17-Inch Laptops, Black (TLE400)
description: This deluxe 17-inch leather notebook case brings together the most popular features of Targus' original leather notebook case plus a more spacious design that's able to accommodate larger-screen notebooks. The removable mesh accessory pouch and divided, expandable file section provide added functionality and storage space, while the Nyflex-lined computer compartment protects your investment. The workstation includes pockets for a PDA, pens, business cards, and other mobile necessities.
